SEARCH
Package com.retriage.retriage.services

Class EventServiceImp

java.lang.Object
com.retriage.retriage.services.EventServiceImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventService
@Service public class EventServiceImp extends Object implements EventService
Implementation of the EventService interface. Provides the concrete business logic for managing Event entities, interacting with the database via EventRepo.

  • Method Details

    • saveEvent

      public boolean saveEvent(Event event)
      Saves an event (Create/Update) in the database. Performs validation before saving.
      Specified by:
      saveEvent in interface EventService
      Parameters:
      event - The event to save.
      Returns:
      true if the event is saved successfully, false otherwise (e.g., validation failure).

    • findEventById

      public Event findEventById(Long id)
      Retrieves an event by its unique ID.
      Specified by:
      findEventById in interface EventService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the event to find.
      Returns:
      The found Event or null if not found.

    • updateEvent

      public Event updateEvent(long id, Event event)
      Updates an existing event with new data. Performs validation before updating.
      Specified by:
      updateEvent in interface EventService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the event to update.
      event - The updated event data.
      Returns:
      The updated event or null if the event was not found or validation failed.

    • findAllEvents

      public List<Event> findAllEvents()
      Retrieves all existing events from the database.
      Specified by:
      findAllEvents in interface EventService
      Returns:
      List of all events. Returns an empty list if no events exist.

    • deleteEventById

      public void deleteEventById(Long id)
      Deletes an event by its unique ID. Checks if the event exists before attempting deletion.
      Specified by:
      deleteEventById in interface EventService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the event to delete.

    • findActiveEvent

      public Event findActiveEvent()
      Finds the currently active (Running) event. If multiple events are found with Status.Running, logs an error and returns null.
      Specified by:
      findActiveEvent in interface EventService
      Returns:
      The active Event entity if exactly one is found with Status.Running, otherwise null.

    • resetEventById

      public Event resetEventById(Event event)
      Resets a given event to its initial state (Status.Created) and clears patient-specific data. Specifically, it clears the list of patients from all associated pools and resets event timing.
      Specified by:
      resetEventById in interface EventService
      Parameters:
      event - The Event entity to reset.
      Returns:
      The reset Event entity, or null if the input event is null.
